{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Google |model=Fiber TV Box |revision=v2 (GFHD200) |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=06/13/2014 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=common |type=set top box |fcc_id=A4RGFHD200 |ic_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model= |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=128 |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |ram1=512 |ram1_brand= |ram1_model=DDR3 |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Marvell |wi1_chip1_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=abgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=F8:8F:CA |oui_eth=F8:8F:CA }} '''Google Fiber TV Box'''
This is presumed to be the v2 ''TV Box''.
The FCC test report indicates this device has... *10/100 Ethernet *MoCA 1.1/2.0 *2.4/5 GHz WiFi AP ([[Marvell]] chipset) *HDMI 1.4 w/ HDCP *Bluetooth (4.0 + BLE)
{{FCC ST|12/10/2014|indexme}}
